page.title: 13Summer in Kington Langley 2.
page.content:
There is also the{Greathouse Fete}at the Cheshire Home in the village. They had horse and cart rides,welly throwing,craft shows,dart throwing to win a fish, trampoline and lots of inflatables. The best one was Moby Dick, which was a blow up whale. On one stall, to win a fish, you had to pay 35p for three darts and had to hit three separate playing cards. We won three goldfish and named them Goldy, Piranha, and Moby Dick. There was also break dancing, a fire engine and free fall parachuting. It was very full and the car park was packed.
This year we are having a cold summer. Last year it was very hot and after we had lain in the sun for a day or two we looked like very burnt Indians.
